attributes.action: Free transport for post 16 in  And at any further education
attributes.additional_details: It appears unfair and discriminates children. If they are required to stay on in education, then their subject choices should be facilitated equally across the board .
attributes.background:
As all post 16 are to stay in education, then their travel to their nearest college/school which offer the courses/ education required to further their future should be free or at least heavily subsidised. 
Not all schools/colleges offer the same subjects which discriminates against the child.

rejection.details:
We've tried to get in touch with you to talk about your petition but we didn't hear back. 

You can get in touch with us at petitionscommittee@parliament.uk if you'd like to resubmit your petition and want to talk about the contents first.
